item.title: The Rising of the Shield Hero game announced for PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
Kadokawa Corporation has announced a game based on the TV anime series The Rising of the Shield Hero for PC, iOS, and Android. It is planned for a global release.

Details about the game, including an official title, were not announced, but Kadokawa Corporation shared comments from series author Aneko Yusagi and character designer Minami Seira.

“The graphics stunned me—it’s almost like the anime was turned straight into a game,” said Yusagi. “I hope everyone enjoys the story and the battles of their own hero as told through the game.”

Seira added, “My long-awaited new work! I’m looking forward to seeing how it comes to life through expressions and interactions unique to games. I’ll be closely supervising, so I hope everyone can look forward to it!”

In related news, Kadokawa Corporation also confirmed production on a fifth season of the TV anime series. Read more about that here.

item.title: The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4 coming to Switch on September 25
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Currently available for PC.

Inside System will release retro-style side-scrolling action game The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4 for Switch on September 25, the developer announced.

The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4 first launched for PC via Steam on June 20.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4 is the latest entry in the action game series that began in 2014.

This 2D action game features charming pixel art, where defeating enemies earns you Tres, a resource used to power up your character.

Each stage hides special enemies called Jammers. Your goal is to track them down and destroy them as you make your way to the stage’s final boss room. Winning boss battles grants you new magic, expanding the actions you can perform.

You play as the Dark Witch, Zizou, on a mission to stop Verde, a mysterious group using magical interference to disrupt global communication and seize control of the world.
